value_claims.claim_description: Global manufacturing business achieved 75% cost reduction and smarter sourcing for high-volume hiring using AI-powered talent solutions.
value_claims.source_quote: 75% cost reduction and smarter sourcing for high-volume hiring. - Global manufacturing business
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Cost reduction explicitly attributed to AI-powered hiring tools in the context of Gen AI in the workplace.

value_claims.claim_title: 30% faster time-to-shortlist with AI in hiring
value_claims.claim_description: Organizations using AI in hiring see 30% faster time-to-shortlist when AI acts as copilot for recruiters, scanning resumes and surfacing stronger matches.
value_claims.source_quote: Organizations using AI in hiring see 30% faster time-to-shortlist and 2–3 times higher win rates on complex searches. Source: Korn Ferry Talent Suite data
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Metric explicitly attributed to organizations using AI in hiring, sourced from Korn Ferry Talent Suite data.

value_claims.claim_title: 2-3x higher win rates on complex searches with AI
value_claims.claim_description: Organizations using AI in hiring achieve 2-3 times higher win rates on complex searches through AI-augmented talent matching and sourcing.
value_claims.source_quote: Organizations using AI in hiring see 30% faster time-to-shortlist and 2–3 times higher win rates on complex searches. Source: Korn Ferry Talent Suite data
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Win rate improvement explicitly attributed to AI use in hiring, verified by Korn Ferry Talent Suite data.

value_claims.claim_title: AI enables reward benchmarking for 58% of organizations
value_claims.claim_description: AI is expected to accelerate reward benchmarking processes, with 58% of surveyed organizations identifying this as a key AI impact area.
value_claims.source_quote: AI is expected to accelerate and enhance reward management in several areas: Reward benchmarking (chosen by 58% of respondents)
value_claims.attribution_evidence: 58% of organizations explicitly identify AI as enabler for reward benchmarking in survey responses.

value_claims.claim_title: AI enhances pay equity monitoring for 50% of organizations
value_claims.claim_description: AI enables pay equity monitoring and transparency improvements, identified by 50% of surveyed organizations as a key application area.
value_claims.source_quote: AI is expected to accelerate and enhance reward management in several areas: ... Pay equity monitoring and transparency (50%).
value_claims.attribution_evidence: 50% of organizations identify AI as enabler for pay equity monitoring in survey, indicating direct AI application.

value_claims.claim_title: AI improves reward communications for 42% of organizations
value_claims.claim_description: AI-enabled personalization enhances reward communications, with 42% of organizations identifying this as a key AI application area.
value_claims.source_quote: AI is expected to accelerate and enhance reward management in several areas: ... Reward communications (42%)
value_claims.attribution_evidence: 42% of surveyed organizations explicitly identify AI as enabler for reward communications improvements.

value_claims.claim_description: Korn Ferry Intelligence Cloud provides AI-enabled talent analytics drawing on 4 billion data points to help organizations identify talent gaps and build workforce blueprints.
value_claims.source_quote: The AI-augmented analytics platform draws on external market intelligence and 4 billion Korn Ferry data points on work structures, roles, and employee skills and motivations
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Platform explicitly described as AI-augmented, with AI enabling analysis of massive data sets for talent insights.

value_claims.claim_title: AI-powered job auto-matching in Profile Manager
value_claims.claim_description: Flexible AI-powered job auto-matching enables customers to surface jobs, skills, and benchmarks dynamically from Korn Ferry's IP library.
value_claims.source_quote: flexible AI-powered job auto-matching in Profile Manager, this release continues to empower our customers to surface the jobs, skills, and benchmarks they need, when they need them
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Feature explicitly described as AI-powered, enabling dynamic matching of jobs and skills from knowledge base.

context_claims.claim_title: Korn Ferry is a global organizational consulting firm
context_claims.claim_description: Korn Ferry is headquartered in Los Angeles with more than 7,500 people in 50+ countries, providing organizational consulting services.
context_claims.source_quote: Headquartered in Los Angeles, Korn Ferry provides services in talent acquisition, organizational strategy, rewards and benefits, assessment and succession, and leadership development. The firm has more than 7,500 people in 50+ countries.

context_claims.claim_title: Survey of 15,000 global employees across multiple demographics
context_claims.claim_description: Workforce 2025 research based on survey of 15,000 professionals worldwide across entry-level to CEO positions in 15 major markets.
context_claims.source_quote: Korn Ferry surveyed more than 15,000 professionals worldwide to understand how they feel about their work. The Workforce 2025 Global Insights Report included participants from entry-level positions to CEOs across 15 major markets

context_claims.claim_title: Total Rewards survey of nearly 8,000 global organizations
context_claims.claim_description: Global Total Rewards Pulse Survey conducted in October 2025 with nearly 8,000 global organizations participating.
context_claims.source_quote: Conducted in October 2025, the consulting firm's survey reflects insights and responses from nearly 8,000 global organizations

context_claims.claim_description: Korn Ferry Intelligence Cloud AI-powered talent analytics platform was launched in 2025, with Vijay Konda hired earlier that year to build architecture.
context_claims.source_quote: Korn Ferry earlier this year hired Vijay Konda to help build the architecture for the Intelligence Cloud solution.

context_claims.claim_title: AI applied to talent acquisition processes
context_claims.claim_description: AI used in recruitment for resume scanning, candidate matching, and reducing bias in hiring processes.
context_claims.source_quote: As a copilot for recruiters, it scans resumes in seconds, surfaces stronger matches, and helps reduce bias. The result is faster hiring and a better experience

context_claims.claim_title: AI applied to total rewards and compensation management
context_claims.claim_description: AI used for reward benchmarking, pay equity analysis, compensation communications, and data integration across HR platforms.
context_claims.source_quote: AI is expected to accelerate and enhance reward management in several areas: Reward benchmarking (chosen by 58% of respondents); Reward communications (42%); Data integration across HR platforms (42%); and, Pay equity monitoring and transparency (50%).

context_claims.claim_title: AI applied to workforce analytics and planning
context_claims.claim_description: AI-enabled talent analytics platform helps organizations gain real-time workforce insights, identify skills gaps, and build talent blueprints.
context_claims.source_quote: The firm's new analytics platform helps clients gain a clearer, real-time picture of their workforce, uncover and develop the skills the organization needs, and build a talent blueprint

context_claims.claim_title: Addressing HR capability gaps in AI adoption
context_claims.claim_description: 65% of organizations acknowledge HR skill gaps in effectively using AI, requiring investment in analytics and AI-enabled reward tools.
context_claims.source_quote: However, 65% of surveyed organizations acknowledge HR skill gaps in effectively using AI. Trust, explainability and governance will be essential to successful adoption.

context_claims.claim_title: Korn Ferry Talent Suite product portfolio
context_claims.claim_description: Comprehensive talent management platform including Profile Manager, Korn Ferry Pay, Korn Ferry Learn, Korn Ferry Coach, Korn Ferry Listen, and Korn Ferry Sell.
context_claims.source_quote: These advancements reaffirm our commitment to enhancing the employee experience and enabling organizations to build resilient, high-performing teams.

context_claims.claim_title: Platform built on 4 billion data points
context_claims.claim_description: Intelligence Cloud draws on 4 billion Korn Ferry data points based on 70 million assessments and rewards data for 26 million people at 25,000 companies in 150+ countries.
context_claims.source_quote: The AI-augmented analytics platform draws on external market intelligence and 4 billion Korn Ferry data points on work structures, roles, and employee skills and motivations – based on 70 million assessments and rewards data for 26 million people at 25,000 companies in more than 150 countries.

context_claims.claim_title: Manufacturing sector client achieved cost reduction
context_claims.claim_description: Global manufacturing business achieved 75% cost reduction in high-volume hiring using AI-powered solutions.
context_claims.source_quote: 75% cost reduction and smarter sourcing for high-volume hiring. - Global manufacturing business

context_claims.claim_description: Korn Ferry's 2025 Talent Trends report and Workforce 2025 Global Insights Report released in April 2025, highlighting shifts in global workforce dynamics.
context_claims.source_quote: LOS ANGELES, April 17, 2025 – Korn Ferry (NYSE: KFY) today released its Workforce 2025 Global Insights Report
